scripts.deploy:all: yarn deploy:rinkeby && yarn deploy:polygon && yarn deploy:mainnet && yarn deploy:arbitrumOne && yarn deploy:optimism
scripts.deploy:arbitrumOne: yarn build && yarn codegen && yarn prepare:arbitrumOne && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ ScopeLift/UmbraArbitrumOne
scripts.deploy:goerli: yarn build && yarn codegen && yarn prepare:goerli && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ scopelift/umbragoerli
scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn build && yarn codegen && yarn prepare:mainnet && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ ScopeLift/UmbraMainnet
scripts.deploy:optimism: yarn build && yarn codegen && yarn prepare:optimism && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ ScopeLift/UmbraOptimism
scripts.deploy:polygon: yarn build && yarn codegen && yarn prepare:polygon && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ ScopeLift/UmbraPolygon
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: yarn build && yarn codegen && yarn prepare:rinkeby && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ ScopeLift/UmbraRinkeby
scripts.deploy:sepolia: yarn build && yarn codegen && yarn prepare:sepolia && goldsky subgraph deploy 'umbra-sepolia/v1.0.0
